objects.text:
• Digital LED Display
• Sleek Modern Design
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Multiple Wash & Dry Cycles

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Front Load Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Digital LED display with intuitive controls and multiple wash/dry settings
• Sleek white design with modern black accents and premium finish
• Large capacity front-loading washer and matching dryer
• Energy-efficient operation with advanced programming options
• Smart dial control for easy cycle selection
• Clear viewing window with chrome trim design
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for apartments and homes
• Multiple wash and dry cycles for various fabric types
• Easy-access front panel maintenance door
• Ventilated dryer system for efficient drying
• Durable construction with stabilizing feet
• Contemporary style that complements modern home decor

banner_details:
The banner is a promotional layout featuring a modern home laundry appliance set. At the top left, bold and uppercase heading layers like `heading_1` and `heading_2` are stacked with strong emphasis. Just below them, subheading `subheading` adds further context in a softer blue tone. A smaller, informational paragraph identified by `description` outlines four distinct product features with bullet points. On the right half, `tagline` in a cursive font delivers an elegant slogan overlaying a diagonally split geometric background. Lower left contains a prominent price text `price` and a vibrant orange CTA button `cta_background` with `cta` text. The `product_image` showcases two laundry machines, creating a clean professional visual balance. 

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1E3D59
- Light Blue: #C4E0F9
- Sky Blue: #3A6EA5
- White: #FFFFFF
- Orange (CTA): #FF9E3F
- Light Gray Accents: #F5F5F5
product_color: The product image features a modern, minimalistic aesthetic dominated by a clean white base (#FFFFFF), lending a sleek and hygienic appeal. The black elements (#000000), such as the door rims and digital panel, contrast strongly with the white, highlighting functionality areas. Soft gray shades (#D1D1D1) on the control panel and metallic dial (#B0B0B0) provide subtle blending, avoiding harsh transitions and maintaining visual flow. Vibrant blue accents on the LED screen (#00BFFF) and dial ring (#0078FF) add a touch of liveliness, drawing attention to interface elements. These selected hues create a technological yet clean vibe ideal for an appliance banner.
